scripts.rinkeby-deploy: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ erasureprotocol/rinkeby-v130 rinkeby/subgraph.yaml
scripts.kovan-deploy: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ erasureprotocol/kovan-v130 kovan/subgraph.yaml
scripts.mainnet-deploy: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ erasureprotocol/v130 mainnet/subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 erasureprotocol/v130 kovan/subgraph.yaml
